# Getting Started with R, RStudio, and Reading Data

## Learning Objectives

By the end of this chapter, you will be able to:

1. Navigate the RStudio interface and understand its main components
2. Create and manage R Projects for organized workflows
3. Install and load R packages
4. Create and render Quarto documents
5. Read CSV and Excel files into R
6. Perform basic data exploration
